name: Ator
notes: Archaeological site with suspected Ancient artifacts. Former Sword World occupation (1132-1135), now under Darrian protection.

celestialObjects.name: Ator Primary

stellarInfo.description: A white main sequence star, slightly hotter and more massive than Sol. Primary star of a binary system.

celestialObjects.gmNotes: F7 V white-yellow main sequence. Primary of binary system.

celestialObjects.name: Ator Secondary

stellarInfo.description: A dim red dwarf star, the distant companion to Ator Primary.

celestialObjects.gmNotes: M2 V red dwarf. Companion star at outer system.

celestialObjects.name: Ator
celestialObjects.gmNotes: Small world with tainted atmosphere. Pop ~800. Feudal Technocracy. Law 8. Ancient artifact site.

celestialObjects.name: Ator Downport
celestialObjects.gmNotes: Class D Poor starport. Surface facility. Minor repairs only. Unrefined fuel.

celestialObjects.name: Ator Gas Giant
celestialObjects.gmNotes: Primary gas giant. Good for wilderness refueling.

celestialObjects.name: Outer Gas Giant
celestialObjects.gmNotes: Secondary gas giant near companion star.

celestialObjects.name: Ator Belt
celestialObjects.gmNotes: Main planetoid belt. Possible Ancient artifact debris.

roleContent.captain: Remote system - good for laying low. Darrian patrols infrequent. Watch for suspicious ships.
roleContent.astrogator: Binary system complicates jump calculations. Flammarion is J-2 from here. Plot carefully.
roleContent.pilot: Tainted atmosphere requires sealed craft. Small downport only - no repair facilities.
roleContent.engineer: Class D port - unrefined fuel only. Gas giant skimming recommended. Check all seals.
roleContent.sensors: Binary star interference affects deep scans. Archaeology site may have unusual readings.
roleContent.gunner: Minimal traffic makes firing drills possible. Ancient debris in belt - avoid!
roleContent.medic: Atmosphere tainted - filter masks required. Limited medical supplies at port.
roleContent.steward: Sparse population (~800). Archaeological team may need supplies or transport.
roleContent.cargo: Artifact trade strictly regulated. Food and equipment imports valued.

news.headline: ANCIENT ARTIFACT DISCOVERY ANNOUNCED
news.content: New chamber uncovered at primary dig site. Artifacts consistent with Ancient technology. Access restricted pending evaluation.

news.headline: DARRIAN PATROL ROTATION BEGINS
news.content: DNS Mireille arrives for standard 6-week patrol. All vessels reminded to maintain proper transponder codes.

news.headline: SWORD WORLDS TENSIONS EASE
news.content: Diplomatic talks between Darrian Confederation and Sword Worlds show progress. Border incidents down 30%.

captain.subject: Documentation Reminder
captain.content: Your ship registration is due for renewal in 90 days. Recommend updating at next Class A starport.

astrogator.subject: Calibration Data
astrogator.content: Ator A/B orbital data updated. Companion star at current position creates optimal jump shadow window in 72 hours.

sensors.subject: Watch List
sensors.content: Two ships matching Garoovian profile passed through last week asking about a liner. Left spinward. Be careful.

gunner.subject: Tip of the Month
gunner.content: Belt asteroid practice improves accuracy. Just ensure Captain authorization and clear fire lanes!
